TopicTitle: Unable to remove or add Kerbals to craft

Articles.Content:
Version: 1.12.3

Problem:
Unable to add Kerbals on crafts or pods on my career save. This started when I added some new mods to my game but, when I tried to remove them, I'm still unable to add Kerbals to my crafts or pods.

I have a lot of mods installed and most of my rockets already in flight have modded parts to them.

When I checked the log this is the message that is there:

[EXC 15:55:23.708] NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object
